item.title: Ailing bull moose on Adirondack mountain hiking trail in New York put down
item.description: A bull moose that forced the closure of an Adirondack hiking trail this summer has been euthanized because of deteriorating health

item.title: Iowa shooting, explosion and fire leave 2 dead and 1 critically injured
item.description: Authorities say a shooting and subsequent explosion and fire in a house in western Iowa left two people dead and a third critically injured

item.title: Officials plan to seek the death penalty for a Tennessee man charged with killing 4
item.description: Prosecutors plan to seek the death penalty against a Tennessee man charged with killing the parents, grandmother and uncle of an infant found abandone...

item.title: Trump's broad tariffs go into effect, just as economic pain is surfacing
item.description: Global financial markets have taken President Donald Trump's tariff adjustments in stride, with Asian and European shares and U.S. futures mostly high...

item.title: Trump administration reverses Biden approval of major wind farm in Idaho
item.description: The Trump administration has reversed a decision by former President Joe Biden to approve a major wind farm development in southern Idaho
